scene.name: intro
scene.line: So I guess these are like ... before and after?
scene.option: The new casks look like they could be used for anything.
I wonder what they keep the old casks around for.

scene.name: new
scene.line: Yeah, before they get all warped and stained ... You really can't undo that, can you?

scene.name: old
scene.line: They smell nice for a little while, but it's pretty overpowering. No way around that smell ...

scene.name: renew
scene.line: No way to clean them after the aging process, I mean. It's a one-way street.
